{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-3","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024 designs architectural and digital works,
in which sound and light scores are orchestrated within the space,
and controlled by custom computer code.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" architecture is a creative studio founded in 2007 by ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"Pier Schneider","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" and ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"François Wunschel.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Breaking away from the notion of limits between disciplines, the studio focuses on spatial practices, digital technology, and visual effects to create unique artworks, installations, and performances. ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" sees architecture and inhabited spaces as evolutive structures. The duo devises new and original experiences, accompanied by their associates and developers. Installations, stage design, visual arts, performances, and lighting structures are all ways of awakening our sensations, touching our bodies and memories.From one-day projects to perennial installations, ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" designs unique artworks that interact with their environment.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024 = 210
1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" equals 2 to the power of 10.
","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" is a recurrent number in computer science.
","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" is a screen resolution.
","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" bytes = 1 Kilobyte.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"1024","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" is a creative studio.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
